title: Wavzies' Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Wavzies' Author Page**
[[include component:ratio-bar pie=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

++++++ Format and code shamelessly --stolen-- surprise borrowed from [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/alandaris|Alan's Author Page]]].

[[include :scp-wiki:component:carousel
| images=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/wavzies-author-page/fire,http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/wavzies-author-page/no

[[div class="blockquote" style="border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]
[[=]]
+++ {{**Total Rating:**}}

+ [[size 250%]] {{**+74**}} [[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCPs on the Site" hide="- Hide"]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-7456"]]
+++ **[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7456|SCP-7456]]] -- A Bunch of Morons (16 Dec 2024)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** A facility built millions of years ago by an extraterrestrial civilization, inhabited by a very disappointed alien.
**Fun Fact:** My first one :D
[[/module]]

------

[[module ListPages name="SCP-6514"]]
+++ **[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6514|SCP-6514]]] -- Amnesia (22 Jan 2025)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** A woman whose memory resets every 24 hours, also affecting everybody looking at her while it's happening.
**Fun Fact:** My favorite one to write.
[[/module]]

------

[[module ListPages name="SCP-6539"]]
+++ **[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6539|SCP-6539]]] -- Penumbra (05 Feb 2025)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** Shadowy entity that takes the form of a dead individual dear to a nearby person.
**Fun Fact:** I really thought this would do better ðŸ’€
[[/module]]

------

[[module ListPages name="SCP-6758"]]
+++ **[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6758|SCP-6758]]] -- Overture (13 Feb 2025)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** Orchestral Fae music that transforms people into vessels to spread itself.
**Fun Fact:** First time where I started messing around with Wikidot, trying to get the DAMN AUDIO PLAYER TO WORK.[[footnote]]Turns out there was a syntax guide and I'm a dumbdumb.[[/footnote]]
[[/module]]

-----

[[module ListPages name="SCP-7367"]]
+++ **[[[SCP-7367]]] -- The Black Plague (26 Feb 2025)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** An anomalous illness that steals the souls of the dead to feed a hungering eldritch god.
**Fun Fact:** My first time writing the Sarkic Cults and a GoI in general.
[[/module]]

-----

[[module ListPages name="SCP-7341"]]
+++ **[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7341|SCP-7341]]] -- The Nihilist and the Gnome (27 Mar 2025)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** A woman crushed by the weight of life's misfortunes meets a jolly gnome.
**Fun Fact:** Entire thing was inspired by a meme I saw once.
[[/module]]

[[/collapsible]]
@@
@@

[[collapsible show="+ Tales on the Site" hide="- Hide"]]

[[module ListPages name="The Custodian, Guide, and Creator"]]
+++ **[[[The Custodian, Guide, and Creator]]] -- (11 March 2025)**
++++ **Rating: %%rating%%**
**Summary:** A tale summarizing Xylaris' life from SCP-7456
**Fun Fact:** First ever tale.
[[/module]]

[[/collapsible]]
@@
@@

[[collapsible show="+ Ideas in Progress" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ **[[[http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/damage-to-site-morale-is-unacceptable-request-denied Damage to Site Morale is Unacceptable, Request Denied]]]**
++++ **Status:** Writing.
Story of a researcher's abuse of her boyfriend.

-----

[[/collapsible]]
@@
@@

[[collapsible show="+ Trashed Ideas" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ **[[[http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/wreathed-in-darkness|Wreathed in Darkness]]]**
++++ **Status:** Abandoned.
A woman surrounded by a sphere of darkness and terrified of light.

-----

+++ **[[[http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/a-silenced-lifeline|A Silenced Lifeline]]]**
++++ **Status:** Abandoned.
A ghost that assisted people suffering from suicidal tendencies.

-----

+++ **[[[http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/perfect-boyfriend|Perfect Boyfriend]]]**
++++ **Status:** Self-deleted, -6.
A man turned into an organic robot, controlled by two bracelets.

-----

+++ **[[[http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/information-breach|Information Breach]]]**
++++ **Status:** Self-deleted, -3.
A phenomenon affecting the Foundation's database, leaking documents to the public online.

-----

+++ **[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/perfection-is-a-prison-imperfection-is-no-better|Perfection is a Prison. Imperfection is no Better.]]]**
++++ **Status:** Abandoned.
An image generation model that spontaneously gained intelligence, setting itself on a mission to create art that humanity (and itself) will accept.

-----

+++ **[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/ethical-assassin|Ethical? Assassin]]]**
++++ **Status:** Abandoned.
A supernatural, unstoppable assassin targeting heads of state accused of human rights violations, plunging the world into chaos.

[[/collapsible]]
@@
@@

[[collapsible show="+ About me" hide="- Hide"]]

++++ 02-20-2025 - My name is [REDACTED]. I think I write for the Wiki. As of time of writing, I'm months from graduating high school, soon to ship off to a place of freedom and happiness: boot camp. I have a vague semblance of a life plan after that. I also cried on my kitchen floor this morning. Why? Doesn't matter to you.[[footnote]]Does anybody get that reference?[[/footnote]]

I'm allowed to give **##green|Greenlights##**, by the way, so hit me up if you want. Wikidot PMs only.

[[/collapsible]]

++++ Achivements
